title: StepWeb API DSL - Person
description: A DSL definition of StepWeb API's Person endpoint using JSON Schema

start.description: Starting index to offset results from.

count.description: Maximum number of results to return.

expand.description: 'false' (default) to return summary profiles, 'true' to return complete profiles.

sort.description: List of entities to sort on, ordered in sort priority.

items.description: Entity to sort on, with sort direction.

entity.description: The entity name to sort on.

direction.description: The direction to sort, 'desc' by default.

query.description: Root of query to be searched.

^(AND|OR)$.description: An array of entityDefinition or compoundQuery objects. Items can be nested compoundQuery objects.

entity.description: Name of the entity to be queried.

criteria.description: Specific criteria for the id entity.

value.description: The unique identifier for an instance of a person.

exclude.description: An array of profile IDs to be excluded from query results.
